strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Cozy RPG Update' metaphor aligns perfectly with the requested retro 8-bit aesthetic. Treating new AI models as 'inventory items' and bug fixes as 'patch notes' or 'leveling up' gamifies the technical content, making it engaging for Gen-Z developers while maintaining the warm, welcoming Pollinations brand vibe.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee character wearing headphones sitting at a retro computer desk in a sunlit garden. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. On the desk: a pixel microphone and speaker. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley meets coding. Text 'UPDATE LOG' in pixel font on the CRT monitor. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Cover image establishing the cozy coding vibe and hinting at audio updates.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art inventory screen UI. Soft pastel background (mint to peach). Four distinct inventory slots with lime green (#ecf874) borders: 1. A pixel microphone üéôÔ∏è, 2. A pixel speaker üîä, 3. A glowing blue game cartridge labeled 'GLM-4', 4. A glowing purple game cartridge labeled 'MiniMax'. Cozy vibes, clean UI like Unpacking. Warm lighting.
images.description: Visualizing the new Audio capabilities and Fireworks AI models as collectable RPG items.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art 'High Score' screen. A pixelated seed sprouting into a flower in the center. Text in a retro dialogue box at the bottom: 'Bug Fixes: Seed Cap Fixed & JSON Mode'. Soft mint and pink gradient background. Warm lighting, peaceful atmosphere like A Short Hike. Chunky pixels.
images.description: Highlighting the technical fixes (Seed cap, JSON) in a rewarding, positive way.
